item.title: Announcing Tzipo-stcards
item.description: Hello everyone. Just a little update. As a way of thanking my Patrons, Iâ€™m taking some time over the next two weeks or so to create a little set of Tzipora postcards and send them out as gifts. How many cards will the set contain? Iâ€™m aiming for about six cards. How much money would you need to have forked over to get some? I think about $20 over your pledge lifetime would cover print and shipping, though Iâ€™ll let you know if that goes up or down.
